    • run

      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable

    • init

      public void init​(boolean resetGame)
      Function called to make players waiting for each other.
      Parameters:
      resetGame - specifies if it's called by a reset request.

    • playAMove

      public void playAMove​(int holeIndex) throws UnplayableHoleException, NotYourTurnException, EasyModeWin
      Function that handle a move from this player. It checks if every rules of the game are respected. If not it throws exceptions.
      Parameters:
      holeIndex - The index of the hole played by the player.
      Throws:
      UnplayableHoleException - Thrown when the played hole is not in the player area, or when the move is starving or not feeding the enemy.
      NotYourTurnException - Thrown when the player send a move but it is not his turn.
      EasyModeWin - Thrown when player has win in easy mode.

    • hasWon

      public boolean hasWon()
      Check if the player has won the round regarding the difficulty. If the difficulty is set to beginner, then a round is won when the total number of seeds is lower than 6 and if the enemy has no seeds in its area. If the difficulty is set to normal, the round is win when the player has more than 24 seeds in its granary. Normal difficulty win conditions is also applied to easy mode.
      Returns:
      true is the round is won.

    • getSeedsInArea

      public int getSeedsInArea()
      Calculate the number of seeds contained in the area of the player.
      Returns:
      number of seeds contained in player area.

    • getEnemy

      public Player getEnemy()
      Get the enemy of this player
      Returns:
      the player enemy

    • handleDisconnection

      public void handleDisconnection()
      handle player disconnection from the server. When one player leave, it sends to its enemy an error. If both players are disconnected, the board can accept connections again.
